sentences.en: About half of the water emerges as freshwater on the other side.
sentences.cn: 大约会有一半体积的淡水出现在另一边。

sentences.en: And while the supply of freshwater is theoretically always the same, in reality it's diminishing.
sentences.cn: 尽管从理论上说,淡水的水源是保持不变的, 但是事实上淡水的供应量正在减少.

sentences.en: As a result, freshwater animals live there at depths greater than anywhere else on earth.
sentences.cn: 因此, 淡水动物在这个湖里比在世界上其他任何地方都能在更深的水中存活.

sentences.en: Both marine and freshwater fisheries are beset by a number of very serious human impacts.
sentences.cn: 无论海洋渔业还是淡水渔业,都为人类造成的一系列严重影响所困扰.

sentences.en: China has the world's richest freshwater fish resources, totalling over 700 species, including 40 to 50 species of major cash fish.
sentences.cn: 中国淡水鱼资源居世界之首, 淡水鱼类有七百多种, 主要经济鱼类有四五十种.

sentences.en: Coal is formed from the remains of freshwater plants.
sentences.cn: 煤是由淡水植物遗骸形成的.

sentences.en: Limnology The scientific study of freshwater and its flora and fauna.
sentences.cn: 湖沼学:研究淡水及生长在其中的动植物群的科学.

sentences.en: Millennia ago, the Black Sea was a freshwater lake.
sentences.cn: 几千年前, 黑海还是个淡水湖.

sentences.en: North American freshwater bass resembling the larger marine striped bass.
sentences.cn: 北美洲淡水鲈鱼,外形象大的条纹石瓰.

sentences.en: North China Plain, the largest freshwater lake - Baiyangdian is located in an new.
sentences.cn: 华北平原最大的淡水湖泊 — 白洋淀就位于安新境内.

sentences.en: Please dip in the freshwater for 1 hour before the use.
sentences.cn: 本产品使用前请用淡水浸泡1小时.

sentences.en: Some freshwater fishes such as pike can withstand levels of acidity.
sentences.cn: 一些诸如梭鱼等淡水鱼可以抵御相当程度的酸性.

sentences.en: The perch is a freshwater fish.
The scientists were studying a freshwater shrimp commonly found in England.
sentences.cn: 科学家们正在研究一种在英国随处可见的淡水虾.

sentences.en: The sea water is heavier than the freshwater, so its pressure is greater, too.
sentences.cn: 海水比淡水重, 因此压力也来得大.

sentences.en: There are bright prospects for freshwater fish farming.

words.tran_cn: 新鲜的；清新的；淡水的；无经验的

trans.tran_en: having water that contains no salt
